translation: Godd chhus bh kran khdae sndih nav sintụ̄, yus setthah rḥm krvun chhu yus setthah mhrban chhu.

Sạry tʿryf, mdḥ th thna pzn tsụ̄ dhati paks yasund nav chhu ḥẓrt Allah. (kyazi prth chyzah th prth nʿmtah pạdh krvun thi chhu suvy, ʿṭa krvun thi chhu suvy. Lhādha shvbn ḥmd v thna tsụ̄ yvt.) yus mạlk th prvrsh krvun chhu sariny ʿālamn hund. (mkhlvqatn hund aakh aakh jns chhu gnzrnh yivan aakh aakh ʿālm, mthlaan ʿālami mlaykah, ʿālam ansan, ʿālam jin, ʿālam jmadat, ʿālam nbatat, ʿālami vḥvsh v ṭyvr.)
Yus sariny rḥm krvun chhu dunyahs andr, yus pnnụ̄ rḥmt jạry thavvun chhu baaymann petth ạkhrts andr.
Yus mạlk th akhtyarh vvl chhu jzakhi duhuk. (jzahuk doh gvv qyamtuk doh, yymhi doh rattn sạry pnnyn ʿmln hund bdlh, yymụ̄ yuth kvrmut āshi suh tulhi tiythue phl.)

Chạny yạcz chhi asụ̄ bndgy th prstsh kran byyhi nh kạnshi hnz, byyhi chhi asụ̄ cze yvt yạry th mdd mngan byyhi nh kạnshi. (yhi chhu bndn hndi ṭrfh khdae snzi dargahi aandr altja, yhi hychhnạvụ̄ Allah tʿālyā han pnnụ̄ bndh kh thndis drbars andr kithh pạtthụ̄ gczihh ḥạẓr spdun, kithh pạtthụ̄ gczihh sval krun.)

Vath timn lvukn hnz yimn cze nʿmcz ʿṭa karyth (yʿny nbvtch nʿmt, rsaltch nʿmt, ṣdyqytch nʿmt, shhadtch nʿmt, ṣalḥytch nʿmt.) tihnz vath nh yimn petth chạnụ̄ czakh chhe, yimn petth czh be zar chhukh tihnzi nafrmạny hnzi sbbh, byyhi nh tihnz vath yim gmrah spdụ̄, vathi nishhi ddlụ̄. (tim ge yhvd v nṣaryā byyhi sạry bạṭl frqh yim afraṭ v tfryṭs mnz mubtla spdụ̄.)
